meanings.definition: A person or thing that clears something.
meanings.sent1: The clearers removed all the fallen leaves from the garden.
meanings.sent2: The janitorial staff are the clearers of the school hallways.
meanings.sent3: The clearers of the table were so efficient that they even cleared away the crumbs.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight acted as a natural clearer, dissipating the morning fog.
meanings.sent5: The clearers of the path made sure no obstacles blocked the way.

meanings.definition: A device or substance used to clear something.
meanings.sent1: The windshield wipers are effective clearers of raindrops on the car.
meanings.sent2: The air purifier is a great clearer of allergens in the room.
meanings.sent3: The soap was a magical clearer of the stubborn stain on the shirt.
meanings.sent4: The broom was a swift clearer of dust bunnies under the bed.
meanings.sent5: The vacuum cleaner was a powerful clearer of dirt on the carpet.

meanings.definition: A person who clears a specified amount of money.
meanings.sent1: The cashier was the top clearer of the day, handling many transactions.
meanings.sent2: The fundraiser was a successful clearer, collecting donations for the cause.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was a cute little clearer of spare change.
meanings.sent4: The salesperson was a skilled clearer of the inventory, making sure everything was accounted for.
meanings.sent5: The accountant was a meticulous clearer of financial records, ensuring accuracy.
